Name: Catalyst LaserByte
Description: Catalyst LaserByte is a high-energy member of the WebtrES club, known for his vibrant rosso corsa exterior and the playful cat-themed buttons that seem to give him nine lives in the digital realm. With classic arms and legs that support his sturdy frame, he's always up for real-world exploration. But it's his laser screen that truly sets him apart, capable of projecting intense beams of light to create dynamic displays or cut through virtual obstacles. Catalyst spends his days syncing with the beats of electronic music and nights coding up new ways to integrate his laser talents into the latest dance scene.
